Class Schemas

java.lang.Object
org.apache.calcite.schema.Schemas
public final class Schemas extends Object
Utility functions for schemas.

    • subSchema

      public static @Nullable CalciteSchema subSchema(CalciteSchema schema, Iterable<String> names)
      Returns a sub-schema of a given schema obtained by following a sequence of names.

      The result is null if the initial schema is null or any sub-schema does not exist.
